solution.text:
Let the common multiple be x.
Therefore, the sides are as follows:
i.e., a = 5x , b = 8x and c = 5x
We know :
Perimeter = sum of all sides
Therefore, perimeter = 5x + 8x + 5x = 18x
i.e.,_{{18*j}}_ = 18x
i.e., x = _{j}_
Hence, a = _{{5*j}}_, b = _{{8*j}}_ and c = _{{5*j}}_
Thus, s = \(a+b+c\over 2\) = \(_{{5*j}}_+_{{8*j}}_+_{{5*j}}_\over 2\) = _{{9*j}}_
Now, applying Heron's formula:
i.e., Area of triangle = \(\sqrt{s(s-a)(s-b)(s-c)}\)
i.e., Area of triangle = \(\sqrt{_{{9*j}}_\times _{{4*j}}_\times _{{1*j}}_\times _{{4*j}}_}\)
i.e., Area of triangle = \(\sqrt{_{{9*j*4*j*j*4*j}}_}\)
i.e., Area of triangle = _{{4*3*j*j}}_

content.text: The ratio of the sides of a triangle are 5:8:5 and the perimeter of the triangle is _{{18*j}}_ cm. Find the area of the triangle.
